H0.text: Which sea lies between Italy and the former Yugoslavia. Ionian Sea

H1.text: Which sea lies between Italy and the former Yugoslavia. Aegean Sea

H2.text: Which sea lies between Italy and the former Yugoslavia. Tyrrhenian Sea

H3.text: Which sea lies between Italy and the former Yugoslavia. Adriatic

A4.text: The Adriatic Sea () is a body of water separating the Italian Peninsula from the Balkan Peninsula.
